sourcesContent:
import React, { useCallback, useEffect, useState, useMemo } from 'react';
import {
    FormControl,
    FormLabel,
    SimpleGrid,
    VStack,
    Input,
    FormHelperText,
    Box,
    Heading,
    Text,
} from '@chakra-ui/react';


export default function Form() {
    return (
        <>
        <Heading textAlign="center">Create a new passport</Heading>
        <Text textAlign="center">Create a new profile for your pet. If you already have an account connect to your wallet to view your NFT</Text>
            <SimpleGrid columns={1} spacing={10}  m="120px">
                <VStack spacing={8} borderRadius={30} borderWidth={2} p={10} bg="#F4F2F2" color="grey">
                    <VStack>
                        <FormControl >
                            <FormLabel color="#6D5D5D">Email address</FormLabel>
                            <Input type='email' borderColor="#B8B5B5" color="black" borderWidth={3} />
                            <FormHelperText>We'll never share your email.</FormHelperText>
                        </FormControl>
                        <FormControl>
                            <FormLabel color="#6D5D5D">Email address</FormLabel>
                            <Input type='email' borderColor="#B8B5B5" color="black" borderWidth={3} />
                            <FormHelperText>We'll never share your email.</FormHelperText>
                    </FormControl>
                    </VStack>
                </VStack>
            </SimpleGrid>
        </>
    )
}
